summary: I am passionate about teaching and caring for students holistically. I believe it is crucial for students to develop critical thinking skills as they develop their sense of self and their worldview. I prioritize teacher collaboration to develop a community among educators and to develop best practices. I pursue professional development opportunities to better serve all of my students with an emphasis on equity, differentiation and inquiry-based learning. I have recently completed my National Board Certification pending results in January of 2019.

experience.title: English Language Arts Teacher
experience.company: Lakes High School, Clover Park School District
experience.description: Taught 9th, 11th and 12th grade English as well as AP Literature and AP Language; developed curricula across grade levels to meet diverse student needs.

experience.title: Head Of English Department
experience.company: Lakes High School, Clover Park School District
experience.description: Planned and scheduled monthly departmental meetings, allocated department funds, participated in the District Literacy Committee, and facilitated information flow between administration and English teachers; initiated monthly meetings with the Principal and invited teachers to contribute items for professional development.

experience.title: ASB Advisor
experience.company: Lakes High School, Clover Park School District
experience.description: Prioritized student leadership, facilitated leadership development content and project management; advised on student initiatives and emphasized Knowledge, Courage and Compassion to develop student leaders.

education.degree: Master in Teaching: Secondary Education; English Language Learner Endorsement
Bachelor of Arts: English; Minor in Education, Learning and Society

certifications: National Board Certification (pending results in January 2019)
